Home of all things Embroidery, Knitting, Needlearts, Patchwork, Papercrafts and Fine Arts

Your One-Stop For Your Sewing, Knitting, Fine Arts and Craft Needs

Aucklands family-owned, specialty craft shop has all your knitting, embroidery, sewing, art and papercraft needs stitched up. Get hands-on with The Ribbon Rose and receive quality products to enhance your craft for personal or commercial use.

Specialising in everything from sewing and needlecraft, knitting and crocheting, to cardmaking, scrapbooking and fine art supplies, our store has become the favourite one-stop shop for New Zealands creatives, with over 100,000 creative products on offer!

More about us

Bernina Sewing Machine Centre

With the best brands and products to help hone your skills, go from beginner to expert with the help of our craft store.

As Aucklands Bernina agent, The Ribbon Rose stocks the Swiss brands best sewing machines and products, supporting each Bernina sale with complimentary lessons, ongoing technical support and 2 years free servicing.
